sqoop.arg: SELECT AcquisitionID,Acquisition,AcquisitionCode,Description, 5 as "org_id", 'SPTM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.Acquisition WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT AcquisitionVariableTypeID,AcquisitionVariantID,VariableTypeID,NoHeads,NoSamples,NoPositions,EntryOrder,Formula, 5 as "org_id", 'SPTM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.AcquisitionVariableType WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT ActionStatusID,ActionStatus,ConditionalFormat,IsClosedState, 5 as "org_id", 'SPTM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.ActionStatus WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT AssetCycleCountID,AssetID,RfDayPeriodID,Count,AssetCountTypeID, 5 as "org_id", 'SPTM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.AssetCycleCount WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT AcquisitionVariantID,TargetSampleSize,RfAttrStudyTypeID,Instructions,ImageURI,NoHeads,RfSourceID,DataDeviceID,DeviceArgs,DeviceOutput, 5 as "org_id", 'SPTM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.AVAttribute WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT CauseActionID,Comments,LoginID,OpenedDT,SavedDT,OriginalLoginID,EditedCauseActionID, 5 as "org_id", 'SPTM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.CauseAction_ WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT CostCentreID,CostCentre,Description, 5 as "org_id", 'SPTM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.CostCentre WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT DocumentID,FileName,Description,MimeType,Attachment,UploadDT,LoginID,DocumentTypeID, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.Document WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT GaugeID,Gauge,GaugeTypeID,DataDeviceID,SerialNo,SupplierID,DatePurchased, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.Gauge WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT InvStateID,InvState,Description,RfInvStateID,InvStateCode,IsAddToProduction,IsAddToHFI,IsDefault, 5 as "org_id", 'SPTM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.InvState WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT AcquisitionChainID,AcquisitionContextID,Sequence,LkACAChainID, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LkACAChain WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT LKConcernInventoryPackID,ConcernID,InventoryPackID, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LKConcernInventoryPack WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT LkDocumentMaintProcID,DocumentID,MaintenanceProcedureID, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LkDocumentMaintProc WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT LineID,LineSectionID,LkLLSID, 5 as "org_id", 'SPTM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LkLLS WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT MachineStopReasonGroupID,MachineStopReasonID,LkMSRGMSRID, 5 as "org_id", 'SPTM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LkMSRGMSR WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT PartID,UnitID,LkPartUnitID, 2 as "org_id", 'SPMM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LKPartUnit WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT ToolStateID,ToolCavityID,RfToolCavityStatusID,ToolCavityStateReasonID,IsCavityChangeState,LkTSTCID, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LkTSTC WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT LkWIRMSetReqID,WorkInstructionResultID,MeasurementSetRequiredID, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LkWIRMSetReq WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT MachineStageTypeID,Name,Description,MachineStageTypeCode, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.MachineStageType WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT MaintenancePartPlannedID,MaintenanceProcedureStepID,PartID,PlannedCost,IsOptional,Quantity,UnitID, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.MaintenancePartPlanned WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT MaintenanceProcedureStepID,MaintenanceProcedureStep,MaintenanceProcedureRevisionID,StepOrder,SubPartID,Component,RfMaintenanceCheckTypeID,RfSpecialActionTypeID,Test,USL,LSL,PersonnelGroupID,SupplierID,Nom,Units,DecPlaces, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.MaintenanceProcedureStep WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT MeasurementSetPID,ActualAttrSampleSize,AcquisitionContextID,IsEdited,DT,AcquisitionID,MachineStageID,RfAcquisitionClassID,RevisionNo,PartID,JobID, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.MeasurementSetP WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT OPCCounterID,OPCItemID,Description,LoValue,HiValue,Scale,Offset,Formula,UnitCountTypeID,ScrapReasonID,ModifiedDT,LoginID,IsProduction,AcceptableRateOfChange,RfDeltaValueModeID, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.OPCCounter WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT OPCMachineEventCodeID,OPCMachineEventCode,OPCMachineEventID,MachineStopReasonID,IsRunning, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.OPCMachineEventCode WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT OperationTypeID,OperationType,OperationTypeCode,Description,PartTypeID,Sequence,IsOptional, 2 as "org_id", 'SPMM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.OperationType WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT ProductionStopID,ProductionStopReasonID,JobID,FromDT,ToDT,LineID,IsEdited,RevisionNo, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.ProductionStop WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT ScrapID,CollectionQuantity,CollectionUnitID,Comments,LoginID,OpenedDT,SavedDT,OriginalLoginID,EditedScrapID,Reference1,Reference2,Reference3,Reference4,Reference5, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.Scrap_ WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT ShiftID,ShiftTypeID,ShiftPatternID,FromDT,ToDT,Sequence, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.Shift WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT SPCChartComponentID,SPCChartDefID,SPCVarChartID, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.SPCChartComponent WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT SPCDefaultControlLimitID,SPCChartDefID,RfChartComponentID,RfChart,UCL,CL,LCL,ModifiedDT,LoginID,ProductID, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.SPCDefaultControlLimit WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT TagCauseActionID,CauseActionID,TagTypeID,TagValue,DT, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.TagCauseAction WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT TagTreeID,TagTree, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.TagTree WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT ShiftID,MachineStageID,JobID,Downtime, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.TMP_Job_Shift_Downtime WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT ToolCavityID,CavityNumber,CavityName,ToolID, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.ToolCavity WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT ToolUsageID,JobID,MachineStageID,ToolID,FromDT,ToDT,ToolPosition,ToolChangeReasonID,IsEdited,RevisionNo,OperationID, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.ToolUsage WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT VarChartOCID,MeasurementSetID,SPCChartControlLimitID,SubgroupID, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.VarChartOC WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT WOID,CustomerOrderNo,LabelsPerInventoryPack,ItemsPerInventoryPack,ItemsPerLayer,LayersPerInventoryPack,PackingCode,LabelTemplate,LabelColour,EANCode,CusStartNum,CusEndNum,CustomerPartNo,CustomerPartDescription,LabelText1,LabelText2,LabelText3,PrinterURL,BOMVariantID, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.WO_ WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT InventoryLabel.InventoryLabelID, InventoryLabel.MachineStage, InventoryLabel.PartNumber, InventoryLabel.PartType, InventoryLabel.QuantityOrdered, InventoryLabel.WONumber, InventoryLabel.InventoryPackNo, InventoryLabel.CreatedFromDT, InventoryLabel.Quantity, InventoryLabel.Unit, InventoryLabel.Line, InventoryLabel.LabelTemplate, InventoryLabel.LabelsPerInventoryPack, InventoryLabel.ItemsPerLayer, InventoryLabel.LayersPerInventoryPack, InventoryLabel.PrinterURL, InventoryLabel.PrintedDT, InventoryLabel.ItemsPerInventoryPack, InventoryLabel.ScannedDT, InventoryLabel.IsCancelled, InventoryLabel.OrderQuantityPacks, InventoryLabel.LineShortName, InventoryLabel.PackNo, InventoryLabel.IsReprint, InventoryLabel.PartDescription, InventoryLabel.LabelSaveDirectory, InventoryLabel.JobID, InventoryLabel.IsPrintLandscape, InventoryLabel.NoCopies, InventoryLabel_.LabelColour, InventoryLabel_.EANCode, InventoryLabel_.CusNum, InventoryLabel_.PackingCode, InventoryLabel_.CustomerPartNo, InventoryLabel_.CustomerPartDescription, InventoryLabel_.LabelText1, InventoryLabel_.LabelText2, InventoryLabel_.LabelText3, InventoryLabel_.Customer, InventoryLabel_.Address1, InventoryLabel_.Address2, InventoryLabel_.City, InventoryLabel_.County, InventoryLabel_.PostCode, InventoryLabel_.Country, InventoryLabel_custom.InventoryPackID, 5 as "org_id", 'SPTM' as "org_name" FROM InventoryLabel FULL JOIN InventoryLabel_ ON (InventoryLabel.InventoryLabelID = InventoryLabel_.InventoryLabelID) FULL JOIN InventoryLabel_custom ON (InventoryLabel.InventoryLabelID = InventoryLabel_custom.InventoryLabelID) WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT WO.WOID, WO.WONumber, WO.RunNo, WO.PartID, WO.QuantityOrdered, WO.RfJobStatusID, WO.DeadlineDT, WO.ActualStartDT, WO.ActualEndDT, WO.PlannedStartDT, WO.PlannedEndDT, WO.EstimatedStartDT, WO.EstimatedEndDT, WO.CustomerID, WO.IsDiscrete, WO.Reference1, WO.Reference2, WO.Reference3, WO.Reference4, WO.Reference5, WO.WORefID, WO_.CustomerOrderNo, WO_.LabelsPerInventoryPack, WO_.ItemsPerInventoryPack, WO_.ItemsPerLayer, WO_.LayersPerInventoryPack, WO_.PackingCode, WO_.LabelTemplate, WO_.LabelColour, WO_.EANCode, WO_.CusStartNum, WO_.CusEndNum, WO_.CustomerPartNo, WO_.CustomerPartDescription, WO_.LabelText1, WO_.LabelText2, WO_.LabelText3, WO_.PrinterURL, WO_.BOMVariantID, WO_custom.BaseWONumber, WO_custom.Txn_date, WO_custom.Wip_Entity_ID, WO_custom.Alternate_Bom, WO_custom.WO_Status, WO_custom.IsBtoCto, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM WO FULL JOIN WO_ ON (WO.WOID = WO_.WOID) FULL JOIN WO_custom ON (WO.WOID = WO_custom.WOID) WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
